name: Nadia Was Here
description: Nadia was Here is a gorgeous pixel RPG that is inspired by 8 and 16 bit classics. Featuring a groundbreaking combat system and a deep, charming story about the value of life, Nadia was Here lets you play an oldschool RPG in a brand new way!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10 Processor: 1.2GHz+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256MB Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10 Processor: 2GHz+ Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB Storage: 200 MB available space
